name: FactToday
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact today
des:
If you like learning new things about a variety of topics, then enable Fact Today now!

All you need to do is say;
Alexa ask Fact Today for a Fact

Each time a random fact will be given to you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
